title: How to Make a Krungthep Cocktail

steps.headline: Muddle star anise with lime and ginger syrup in a cocktail shaker.
Add the lime juice to the cocktail shaker.
Add the gin to the cocktail shaker.
Add the vodka to the cocktail shaker.
Add the iced tea to the cocktail shaker.

text: Muddle star anise with lime and ginger syrup in a cocktail shaker.  Add the lime juice to the cocktail shaker.  Add the gin to the cocktail shaker.  Add the vodka to the cocktail shaker.  Add the iced tea to the cocktail shaker.  Fill the mixer with ice.  Shake well.  Strain into a glass.  Top with guava juice.
